metadata.title: CVE-2020-36150 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect handling of input data in loudness function in the libmysofalibrary 0.5 - 1.1 will lead to heap buffer overflow and access tounallocated memory block.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 1.2~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 1.2~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~dfsg0-1').
